      • checkNumeric

        public boolean checkNumeric(java.lang.String xyPos)
        Checking if the value is numeric, so both X and Y are numeric values
        Parameters:
        xyPos - is the x or y position given by the user
        Returns:
        checking if the value given by user only contains numbers, else returns false

      • checkPositionXY

        public boolean checkPositionXY(int number,
                               int size)
        Check that the value of X and Y is between 0- or the size This is defined in the file gamesettings.txt.
        Parameters:
        xyPos - is the x or y position given by the user
        Returns:
        check if position entered is between the grid size, else gives false

      • stringLengthWithinRange

        public boolean stringLengthWithinRange(java.lang.String shipname)
        Check if the length of Ship name is between 3 to 15 characters. Used in previous assignment
        Parameters:
        shipname - is the name entered by user
        Returns:
        check if the length of shipname is between 3-15 character
